author: Farah Najjar
title: Russian troops advancing closer to Kyiv, US says: Live News
description: Some 100,000 people have fled their homes as US official says Russian troops advancing towards Ukraine’s capital.
content:
• Russian soldiers are advancing in the direction of Ukraines capital, Kyiv, a US official says, as Moscow continues to flow troops into the country.
